name: Ozono Comunicacion
description: Ozono Comunicación is an online marketing agency based in Spain. At Ozono, they understand that success in developing an online communication strategy is based on the adequate combination of coordinated activities in different areas: Web Design and Development, SEO Positioning, Search Engine Marketing (SEM), Media Planning, Environments 2.0, Email Marketing, Corporate Identity, Naming, Video Marketing, Digital Photography, Press Releases and Social Media Management.
